original_text: Eat them as you would gazelle or deer. Both the ceremonially unclean and the clean may eat.
korean_text: 정한 자나 부정한 자를 막론하고 노루나 사슴을 먹는 것 같이 먹을 수 있거니와

sentences.original_text: Eat them as you would gazelle or deer.
Both the ceremonially unclean and the clean
sentences.korean_translation: 의식적으로 부정한 자와 정한 자 모두
